name: acp3/module-contact
description: Provides the contact module for the ACP3 CMS.

suggest.acp3/setup: Allows you to comfortably install and update the ACP3 components via an UI.
suggest.acp3/module-captcha: Provides basic protection against spam bots.
suggest.acp3/module-contact-seo: Allows you to integrate the contact module into the SEO module.
